data.sampled:
Why don't you tell me what the problem is instead of sending a list of 77 categories :)
That way I may be able to help better!

data.sampled: Yes, there is a discount for frequently exchanging currencies. You can get a 5% discount on every exchange transaction up to a certain limit. For example, if you exchange currencies 10 times in a month, you can get a 5% discount on the tenth exchange transaction. This discount is available at several banks and foreign exchange shops, including ING and Chase.

data.sampled: The exchange rate for a Foreign ATM is different because the exchange rate is determined by the banks located in each country, and the rates can vary depending on various factors such as the location of the bank, the liquidity of the local currency, and the demand for it. Additionally, the exchange rate may also be influenced by global market fluctuations and policies set by central banks.

data.sampled: Your kids are required to be 12 years of age and older in order to use the service. The safety and security of your child's card information is of the utmost importance, and only adults with approval from parents or guardians are allowed to manage their card accounts.

data.sampled: If you notice a strange withdrawal in your statement, you should contact your bank or financial institution as soon as possible. They will be able to help you investigate the matter and resolve any potential issues. You should also retain a copy of your statement in case you need to provide it to the bank or financial institution.

data.sampled: If your card gets stuck in the ATM, you should try to withdraw the card from the ATM and hold it up to the reader. If this doesn't work, you should seek assistance from the ATM owner or the nearest bank branch. If you contact your bank to report the issue, they will investigate and resolve it as quickly as possible.

data.sampled:
If you don't have your phone with you, you can still use the app by following these steps:

1. Open the app and log in with your username and password.
2. Tap on the menu icon in the top right corner of the screen.
3. Select "Contactless" or "Online Banking" from the menu options.
4. Follow the on-screen instructions to enter the transaction details manually.
5. Enter the required details, including the card number, the amount to be loaded, and any additional notes.
6. Confirm the transaction by entering your verification code if prompted.

This process will allow you to make contactless payments or access your account information without needing your phone.
